com.ca.mas.foundation.auth

Class MASApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ca.mas.foundation.auth.MASApplication

  • public abstract class MASApplication
extends java.lang.Object
    The Enterprise browser manages a trusted group of enterprise approved applications on a device. Applications within this trusted group can be accessed through single sign-on.

    • Method Detail

      • getIdentifier

        public abstract java.lang.String getIdentifier()
        Returns:
        The application identifier.

      • getName

        public abstract java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        The name of the app.

      • getIconUrl

        public abstract java.lang.String getIconUrl()
        Returns:
        The path to the icon graphic displayed on the device. For example: http://server/connect/enterprise/browser/icon/appa

      • getAuthUrl

        public abstract java.lang.String getAuthUrl()
        Returns:
        The path to the MAG endpoint to request a SAML token. For example: /connect/enterprise/browser/websso/authorize/appc Used when the application is not installed on the device. The application is accessed through WebView. Construct MASWebApplication with the WebView and the AuthUrl

      • getNativeUri

        public abstract java.lang.String getNativeUri()
        Returns:
        The path to launch the native application. This matches the path declared by the app developer in the format: schemeValue://hostValue, for example: camsso://com.camsso.myappname

      • getCustom

        public abstract org.json.JSONObject getCustom()
        Returns:
        Includes optional custom-key and custom-value variables that provide additional data for the requesting app. This section is ignored by the SDK and can be empty;

      • setApplicationLauncher

        public static void setApplicationLauncher(MASApplication.MASApplicationLauncher launcher)
        Set the Application Launcher to launch the Native App and Web App, MASApplication.MASApplicationLauncher.onNativeAppLaunch(MASApplication) is triggered for Native App and MASApplication.MASApplicationLauncher.onWebAppLaunch(MASApplication) for Web App.

      • renderEnterpriseIcon

        public abstract void renderEnterpriseIcon(android.widget.ImageView imageView)
        The application icon is downloaded with the provided URL from getIconUrl() and cached into memory for performance improvement.
        Parameters:
        imageView - A ImageView for the App Icon

      • retrieveEnterpriseApps

        public static void retrieveEnterpriseApps(MASCallback<java.util.List<MASApplication>> callback)
        The MAG administrator creates a JSON-formatted list of native or non-native applications. Native applications are created with the SDK, registered with the MAS, and installed on the device. Non-native applications are not installed on the device but accessed through webView. For approved non-native applications, webSSO with SAML based federation is used.
        Parameters:
        callback - Callback to receive a list of native or non-native applications
